title: *RESOLVED*Mastery 7 token not granted

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: Hi i was being extra thirst buckety for my good play style since im always bad. I got an S and expected a chest but got nothing, but who cares about that i checked my profile and it says where my karthus is mastery 6, that you get a mastery 7 token for an S or higher and i got an S :/ ... I wanna be the very highest prestiged karthus. Pls send help. Rito pls.

replies.body: You were playing an ARAM, and unfortunately you cannot earn mastery tokens on ARAM. You can only earn them on normal and ranked Summoner's Rift.
aw, that actually makes sense, thanks
